languages.text: "Эти люди страдают, как никто другой, а ты отказываешь им в избавлении? Да что с тобой не так?!"
"These people are suffering, more so than anyone, anywhere — and you're refusing them deliverance? What is wrong with you?"
languages.original_text: "Эти люди страдают, как никто другой, а ты отказываешь им в избавлении? Да что с тобой не так?!"

traits.locale_text: "These people are suffering, more so than anyone, anywhere — and you're refusing them deliverance? What is wrong with you?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "These people are suffering, more so than anyone, anywhere — and you're refusing them deliverance? What is wrong with you?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "These people are suffering, more so than anyone, anywhere — and you're refusing them deliverance? What is wrong with you?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "These people are suffering, more so than anyone, anywhere — and you're refusing them deliverance? What is wrong with you?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "These people are suffering, more so than anyone, anywhere — and you're refusing them deliverance? What is wrong with you?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "These people are suffering, more so than anyone, anywhere — and you're refusing them deliverance? What is wrong with you?"

languages.text: «Esta gente sufre más que nadie en ninguna parte, ¿y les niega la liberación? ¿Qué le pasa?».
languages.original_text: "These people are suffering, more so than anyone, anywhere — and you're refusing them deliverance? What is wrong with you?"

traits.locale_text: «Esta gente sufre más que nadie en ninguna parte, ¿y les niega la liberación? ¿Qué le pasa?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「この人たちは誰よりも、どこの人達よりも苦しんでいる。なのにあなたはデリヴァランスを断ろうというのか？なぜだ？」
languages.original_text: "These people are suffering, more so than anyone, anywhere — and you're refusing them deliverance? What is wrong with you?"

traits.locale_text: 「この人たちは誰よりも、どこの人達よりも苦しんでいる。なのにあなたはデリヴァランスを断ろうというのか？なぜだ？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “这些人遭受着最为可怕的苦难，可你却不肯为他们带来解脱？你到底是怎么回事？”
languages.original_text: "These people are suffering, more so than anyone, anywhere — and you're refusing them deliverance? What is wrong with you?"

traits.locale_text: “这些人遭受着最为可怕的苦难，可你却不肯为他们带来解脱？你到底是怎么回事？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Leute leiden, mehr als alle übrigen andernorts – und Ihr verweigert ihnen Erlösung? Was ist nur los mit Euch?"
languages.original_text: "These people are suffering, more so than anyone, anywhere — and you're refusing them deliverance? What is wrong with you?"

traits.locale_text: "Diese Leute leiden, mehr als alle übrigen andernorts – und Ihr verweigert ihnen Erlösung? Was ist nur los mit Euch?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Ces gens souffrent le martyre et vous leur refusez la délivrance ? Qu'est-ce qui ne tourne pas rond chez vous ? »
languages.original_text: "These people are suffering, more so than anyone, anywhere — and you're refusing them deliverance? What is wrong with you?"

traits.locale_text: « Ces gens souffrent le martyre et vous leur refusez la délivrance ? Qu'est-ce qui ne tourne pas rond chez vous ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
